name: BodyOnly - IOS app for bodyweight enthusiasts.
tagline: bodyweight, fitness, iphone app, neila rey
body:
### Bodyweight workouts for power and force.
Inspired by excellent website (http://neilarey.com) - currently (http://darebee.com/).

### Attention!
As it mentioned at (http://darebee.com/terms-of-use.html) "None of the materials from this website, completely or partially, can be used for product development e.g. mobile application development, books or PDF collections, duplicates of this website in English or any other language." So this project not an "mobile application development, books or PDF collections" - its just say my way to study new Apple Swift programming language.

### iPhone images
![App main page](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/9803857/9294091/ace4eb68-446c-11e5-86fb-3aa029a4a5e7.png)
![App about dialog](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/9803857/9294092/ad165d1a-446c-11e5-90a5-8bc408494413.png)
![Social share](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/9803857/9294093/ad18e5a8-446c-11e5-8ae5-70fd01c76453.png)
![Workout page with action red PLUS](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/9803857/9294094/ad400a02-446c-11e5-8091-9aeee443cece.png)
![Workout page with actions](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/9803857/9294095/ad478282-446c-11e5-9263-243e9d31e915.png)
![Mark workout dialog](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/9803857/9294096/ad49bf34-446c-11e5-8dc2-a4502f39b24b.png)
![Timer](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/9803857/9294097/ad4bcf5e-446c-11e5-9dfa-867240f517ed.png)
![Exercise counter](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/9803857/9294098/ad4e0f08-446c-11e5-91f9-d5b77e989c77.png)
![Save poster to Photos](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/9803857/9294099/ad544ad0-446c-11e5-988d-49deb432ffb1.png)

### Features
* Navigation bar disappears when scrolling;
* Status Bar tap scroll list UP;
* TableView animation;
* Custom font (free ;)).


### Important
My bugs - is your responsibility if you are use my code ;)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
